#summary How to install IntelliJ IDEA
#labels Featured

[http://sonarsource.org Sonar] is an open platform to manage code quality.

= Prerequisites =

Configured repository (see [HowTo]).

= Installation =

If you use paludis:
{{{
paludis -i dev-util/idea
}}}

Or using emerge:
{{{
emerge -av dev-util/idea
}}}
